import { useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; function Navbar() { const modalRef = useRef(null); const modalInstanceRef = useRef(null); useEffect(() => { // Initialize Bootstrap modal when component mounts if (modalRef.current && window.bootstrap) { modalInstanceRef.current = new window.bootstrap.Modal(modalRef.current); } // Cleanup modal instance when component unmounts return () => { if (modalInstanceRef.current) { modalInstanceRef.current.dispose(); } }; }, []); const scrollToSection = (sectionId) => { const element = document.getElementById(sectionId); if (element) { const offsetTop = element.offsetTop - 80; // Account for fixed navbar height window.scrollTo({ top: offsetTop, behavior: 'smooth', }); // Close mobile menu if open const navbarCollapse = document.getElementById('navbarNav'); if (navbarCollapse && navbarCollapse.classList.contains('show')) { navbarCollapse.classList.remove('show'); } } }; const showPartnerModal = () => { if (modalInstanceRef.current) { modalInstanceRef.current.show(); } else { // Fallback if Bootstrap is not loaded yet const modal = document.getElementById('partnerModal'); if (modal && window.bootstrap) { const bootstrapModal = new window.bootstrap.Modal(modal); bootstrapModal.show(); } } }; return ( <>
{/* Logo Section */} {/* Mobile Menu Toggle */} {/* Navigation Menu */}
{/* CTA Button Section */}
{/* Partner Modal */}
Hamkor bo'ling!
Bizning jamoamizga qo'shiling!

Yolda bilan hamkorlik qiling va o'z biznesingizni rivojlantiring. Biz sizga barcha imkoniyatlarni taklif qilamiz.

); } export default Navbar;
